actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

official_title: To amend chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.

summary.text: Amends civil service law concerning federal workers' compensation to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.

titles.title: To amend chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.
